review: So far, so good. I got this free with the Sling promotion, and with my mildly low end internet speeds, the stick runs Sling far better than my desktop. People should definitely know to download the PBS application, as it has a ton of free content which has been my favorite part of the stick so far. It has hiccups, the menus seem as though they could be a little less clunky. While I probably wouldn't have bought this outright, I wouldn't be disappointed if I had.I'm sure other reviewers have noted, the stick actually needs to be plugged into an electrical outlet and it seems best to just leave it plugged in rather than charge it periodically. This was not something I realized just based on the product description, so if you're short on outlets, be aware!
